actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to develop a strategy for public health preparedness and response to artificial intelligence threats, and for other purposes.
short_title: Strategy for Public Health Preparedness and Response to Artificial Intelligence Threats

titles.title: Strategy for Public Health Preparedness and Response to Artificial Intelligence Threats
Strategy for Public Health Preparedness and Response to Artificial Intelligence Threats
A bill to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to develop a strategy for public health preparedness and response to artificial intelligence threats, and for other purposes.
